content.text: Mr. SESSIONS. Mr. Speaker, I move that the House do now adjourn.
content.speaker: Mr. SESSIONS

content.text:
The motion was agreed to; accordingly (at 12 o'clock and 26 minutes 
a.m.), under its previous order, the House adjourned until today, 
Wednesday, November 15, 2017, at 10 a.m. for morning-hour debate.
content.speaker: The RECORDER
